00024 #ifndef SOWIN_SPACEBALL_H
00025 #define SOWIN_SPACEBALL_H
00026 
00027 #include <Inventor/Win/devices/SoWinDevice.h>
00028 #include <Inventor/SbLinear.h>
00029 
00030 // *************************************************************************
00031 
00032 class SOWIN_DLL_API SoWinSpaceball : public SoWinDevice {
00033   SOWIN_OBJECT_HEADER(SoWinSpaceball, SoWinDevice);
00034 
00035 public:
00036   enum Mask {
00037     MOTION_EVENT  = 0x01,  MOTION = MOTION_EVENT,
00038     PRESS_EVENT   = 0x02,  PRESS = PRESS_EVENT,
00039     RELEASE_EVENT = 0x04,  RELEASE = RELEASE_EVENT,
00040     ALL_EVENTS = MOTION_EVENT | PRESS_EVENT | RELEASE_EVENT,
00041     ALL = ALL_EVENTS
00042   };
00043 
00044   enum DeviceType {
00045     SPACE_BALL             = 0x01,
00046     MAGELLAN_SPACE_MOUSE   = 0x02
00047   };
00048 
00049   SoWinSpaceball(int events = ALL_EVENTS);
00050   virtual ~SoWinSpaceball();
00051 
00052   virtual void enable(HWND widget, SoWinEventHandler * handler, void * closure);
00053   virtual void disable(HWND widget, SoWinEventHandler * handler, void * closure);
00054 
00055   virtual const SoEvent * translateEvent(MSG * event);
00056 
00057   void setRotationScaleFactor(float f);
00058   float getRotationScaleFactor(void) const;
00059   void setTranslationScaleFactor(float f);
00060   float getTranslationScaleFactor(void) const;
00061 
00062   static SbBool exists(void);
00063 
00064   void setFocusToWindow(SbBool flag);
00065   SbBool isFocusToWindow(void) const;
00066 
00067 private:
00068   class SoWinSpaceballP * pimpl;
00069 };
00070 
00071 // *************************************************************************
00072 
00073 #endif // ! SOWIN_SPACEBALL_H
